about_the_game:
Welcome to Cats Organized Neatly - Paper Edition

As the name suggests, this is a printable version of the video game Cats Organized Neatly! The levels and cats are exactly the same as in the base game, this is just another way to experience the game.

Especially during these challenging times, this could provide a nice way to get some off-screen time and focus on some meditative paper cutting, or gathering your kiddos around the table and getting the cats nicely colored, before organizing them (neatly).

You will get a PDF file with the following content:

  • Game Rules
  • 80 levels, each on their own page
  • Two sets of cat sheets to print and cut:
    • Pre-colored like the in-game version
    • Blank, so you can recolor the cats in any way you like!

We hope you'll enjoy this alternative way of playing the game as well - get creative and have fun! ♡♡

To find the pdf:
1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on Cats Organized Neatly in your game list.
2. Select "Manage"
3. Click "Browse local files"
4. Open CatsOrganizedNeatly_Paper.pdf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or Higher)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this printable paper version of Cats Organized Neatly you can experience the digital game in an alternative way. Print out the cats, cut out and color them and enjoy the game!
